DataSubjectIndicatorMetadata.description:
Metadata for data subject indicators.

Extends BaseFindingMetadata which provides:
- source: str - Source file or location where the data was found
- context: dict[str, object] - Extensible context for pipeline metadata

source.description: Source file or location where the data was found
source.title: Source

context.description: Extensible context for pipeline metadata (connector_type, artifact_id, etc.)
context.title: Context

DataSubjectIndicatorMetadata.title: DataSubjectIndicatorMetadata

description:
Complete output structure for data_subject_indicator schema.

This model represents the full wire format for data subject detection results,
including indicators, summary statistics, and analysis metadata.

findings.description: List of data subject indicators from pattern-based detection
findings.title: Findings

summary.description: Summary statistics of the data subject detection

title: DataSubjectIndicatorOutput
